name: Cultures of Chaos
description:
Cultures of Chaos was created in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 100: Overload event. In this game you'll play as a giant amoeba, from the genus Chaos. These critters can grow up to 5mm in length, which is mind-blowing! The goal is to survive inside of a lab culture (think: petri dish) for as long as possible. What are you surviving from? Paedocypris progenetica - one of the smallest species of fish (10mm in length). How do you survive? By outrunning the progeneticas, and shooting cytoplasm at them. You'll have to keep an eye on your health level though - shooting cytoplasm decreases your health a bit, so make sure to snack on some algae!

Credits

thermokarst: programming, art, game design
johnwatson: audio, game design
d-unit: game design
